name: Cybo-Cop
overview: Old New City is being over run by the Speccy Punks, This is a Job for Cybo-Cop, Push scroll Left with 8 Way shooting, Shoot the Speccy Punks, Save the Lady's, And pick up Point Cans, 1 Player Game. Made with the Sideways Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Jon Wells, Also New V3 SEUCK Framework by Richard Bayliss.
